subject: Testing with JunitEE
msgSnippet: hi! I joined the JunitEE project on sourceforge and succeeded (after quite a few tries) to manage CVS. I made a correction so that JunitEE shows the errors
messageBody:
hi!

I joined the JunitEE project on sourceforge and succeeded
(after quite a few tries) to manage CVS.

I made a correction so that JunitEE shows the errors
correctly on the html-page i.e. instead of
<kaarle> it now outputs <kaarle>

You can find the corrected TestRunner.java version 1.2
in CVS repository.

regards
Kaarle
